an3.92:2.1: 10. Loṇakapallavagga
an3.92:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, kassako gahapati sīghaṃ sīghaṃ khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karoti sumatikataṃ.
an3.92:4.4: Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ khettaṃ sukaṭṭhaṃ karitvā sumatikataṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bījāni patiṭṭhāpeti.
an3.92:4.5: Sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bījāni patiṭṭhāpetvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ udakaṃ abhinetipi apanetipi.
an3.92:4.6: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi kassakassa gahapatissa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni.
an3.92:4.7: Tassa kho taṃ, bhikkhave, kassakassa gahapatissa natthi sā iddhi vā ānubhāvo vā:
an3.92:4.8: ‘ajjeva me dhaññāni jāyantu, sveva gabbhīni hontu, uttarasveva paccantū’ti.
an3.92:4.9: Atha kho, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṃ tassa kassakassa gahapatissa tāni dhaññāni utupariṇāmīni jāyantipi gabbhīnipi honti paccantipi.
an3.92:5.1: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, tīṇimāni bhikkhussa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni.
an3.92:5.4: imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi bhikkhussa accāyikāni karaṇīyāni.
an3.92:5.5: Tassa kho taṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno natthi sā iddhi vā ānubhāvo vā:
an3.92:5.6: ‘ajjeva me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatu sve vā uttarasve vā’ti.
an3.92:5.7: Atha kho, bhikkhave, hoti so samayo yaṃ tassa bhikkhuno adhisīlampi sikkhato adhicittampi sikkhato adhipaññampi sikkhato anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccati.
an3.92:6.2: ‘tibbo no chando bhavissati adhisīlasikkhāsamādāne, tibbo chando bhavissati adhicittasikkhāsamādāne, tibbo chando bhavissati adhipaññāsikkhāsamādāne’ti.
